SELECT NOTICE_IDX , MEM_ID , NOTICE_SUBJECT , NOTICE_CONTENT , NOTICE_DATE , NOTICE_FILE , NOTICE_READ_COUNT FROM NOTICE
WHERE
NOTICE_SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
NOTICE_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
NOTICE_SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR NOTICE_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
MEM_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
WHERE 1 = 1
ORDER BY NOTICE_DATE DESC
ORDER BY NOTICE_DATE ASC
LIMIT #{startRow} , #{listLimit}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE
WHERE
NOTICE_SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
NOTICE_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
NOTICE_SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR NOTICE_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
MEM_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
